data.name: RTM - The Last Days
data.detailed_description:
Through the gates of hell when the last drops of oil burning in the lantern dispel the phantoms that wants your soul and descend into madness' inner sanctum, it might kill you and permanently trick to tip even further into your private hell.


ABOUT THIS GAME
RTM - The Last Days is a first-person action horror and a story-driven walkthrough.
Optional in-game purchases available.

Story:
The players will have to experience living in the skin of a pilot who survived the initial crash of a military plane on an island thought to be empty . After that the player’s character starts to make his way to a close city and once there he will find a dark secret about that place when he find that the island thought to be empty was used by a secret organization called "RTMFORCE" for conducting some kind of experiments on some ancient ruins and by accident opened a portal to hell. Survive and discover the hard choice you will have to make on your secret mission. Show no mercy as you fight through a dark and ruthless world, engage in gory combat and discover limitless options to confront your enemies. Use the environment paired with various weapon types and abilities to gain an advantage. Succeed, and you will be rewarded handsomely but remember that a single mistake could cost you your soul! Is death even a Threat? An ally? Who Knows?

https://discord.gg/P6x3kndNbz

data.short_description: As the only survivor of a military plane crash, you find yourself in a mysterious island battling to stay alive and discover the dark secret that lies beneath the ground.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
